---
title: "ggoce"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
library(oce)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggoce)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(oce)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggoce)
theme_set(theme_oce())
```

## CTD objects

```{r}
data(ctd, package = "oce")
```

### Profile

### Time series

```{r}
ggplot(ctd, aes(timeS, temperature)) +
  geom_line()
```

### Temperature/Salinity

```{r}
oce::plotTS(ctd)
```


```{r}
ggplot(ctd, aes(salinity, oce::swTheta(salinity, temperature, pressure))) +
  # annotation_isopycnal() +
  geom_point()
```


## Section objects


```{r}
data(section, package = "oce")
plot(section)
```


```{r}
ggplot(section, aes(distance, pressure)) +
  geom_point(aes(col = temperature)) +
  scale_y_reverse()
```

## ADP objects

```{r}
data(adp, package = "oce")

plot(adp)
```
